me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents known minecraft server constants.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long ITEM_ENTITY_LIFE
      The number of server ticks for which an untouched Item will survive before being removed.
      static int MAXIMUM_FOOD_LEVEL
      The default maximum food level of a Player, representing a full hunger bar.
      static long TICKS_PER_MINUTE
      The target number of server ticks per minute.
      static long TICKS_PER_SECOND
      The target number of server ticks per second.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long getTicks(double seconds)
      Gets the number of ticks within the specified number of seconds, rounded to the nearest whole number.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • TICKS_PER_SECOND

        public static final long TICKS_PER_SECOND
        The target number of server ticks per second. This is not guaranteed to be accurate, it is only the value targeted as the framerate by the minecraft server. One server tick, on a server which is running at perfect target framerate, is 0.05 seconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TICKS_PER_MINUTE

        public static final long TICKS_PER_MINUTE
        The target number of server ticks per minute.
        See Also:
        TICKS_PER_SECOND, Constant Field Values

      • ITEM_ENTITY_LIFE

        public static final long ITEM_ENTITY_LIFE
        The number of server ticks for which an untouched Item will survive before being removed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAXIMUM_FOOD_LEVEL

        public static final int MAXIMUM_FOOD_LEVEL
        The default maximum food level of a Player, representing a full hunger bar.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getTicks

        public static long getTicks(double seconds)
        Gets the number of ticks within the specified number of seconds, rounded to the nearest whole number.
        Parameters:
        seconds - The amount of seconds.
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds expressed in server ticks.
